title: Mississippi Welfare Scandal Spreads Well Beyond Brett Favre
description: Millions earmarked for the needy in the nation’s poorest state instead went to projects that benefited the well-to-do, the state alleges, including a volleyball stadium at Mr. Favre’s alma mater.
dc:creator: Neil MacFarquhar
media:description: The former N.F.L. quarterback Brett Favre finds himself in the middle of a sprawling scandal in Mississippi.
